caption: In a castle, a man had his serving maid carry a dish of food outside. However, he suddenly called the maid back in and asked her some questions. The maid responded fluently, and subsequently, he released her.In another castle, a man and a woman were engaged in conversation. The man was dressed in armor, and he was asking the woman some questions. It appeared that he was somewhat skeptical of what the girl was saying.Elsewhere, a person with dark skin was conversing with a woman, seemingly trying to persuade her of something. However, the woman rejected their proposal and ascended a staircase, leaving the mountain location.A man and a woman were walking together, with the man tying a rope around the woman. It appeared that the woman was carrying a baby.In a campsite, a doctor was providing care to a patient.
